nodes.text: The Ewok Festival of Love were a series of paintings made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. There were two versions of the paintings: one depicted two Ewoks (a brown Ewok and a white Ewok) embracing each other in the forests of Endor, and the other was a purple-toned painting depicting a green ribbon with red and blue dots, an Ewok cub, and Aurebesh writing. Both were sold during festivities of the titular annual event, the Ewok Festival of Love.

The painting(s) were available for the Festival of Love events, where they could be purchased for eight chak hearts. After game update 10, they were labeled as a non share trade item. By Ewok Festival of Love 2010, the painting was given a different design.
